plot: A veteran suffering from PTSD imagines that he is a combatant in the European theater during World War II. Although he is subdued and admitted to a mental health facility, he escapes and continues his rampage.
title: The Ghost Soldier
plot_es: A veteran suffering from PTSD imagines that he is a combatant in the European theater during World War II. Although he is subdued and admitted to a mental health facility, he escapes and continues his rampage.
plot_en: A veteran suffering from PTSD imagines that he is a combatant in the European theater during World War II. Although he is subdued and admitted to a mental health facility, he escapes and continues his rampage.
